eyes: Blue (as Molek); Flaming red (as Ghost Rider)
hair: Salt and pepper goatee (as Molek); None (as Ghost Rider)
placeofbirth: Presumably somewhere in the Middle East
powers: It can be assumed Molek possessed all the powers given to every Spirit of Vengeance
realname: Molek (unrevealed if this is his first or last name)
significantissues: Came to Blaze in his hour of need in an attempt to give him new hope (Ghost Rider #29, 2008)
Brought Blaze and the others to meet the Ghost Riders of the Congo (Ghost Rider #31, 2009)
Fought alongside other Ghost Riders, but Daniel Ketch eventually took Molek’s power from him (Ghost Rider #32, 2009)
Molek returned to face Zadkiel and the Anti-Christ (Ghost Riders: Heaven’s On Fire #6, 2010)
